doc_text: Democratic state attorney generals and environmental groups are gearing up for what is expected to be a precedent-setting legal battle with the Trump administration over its rollback of an Obama-era power plant pollution rule....
doc_summ: High-stakes legal fight looms over Trump pollution rule
